short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ping any page you are on by clicking on the icon in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Add-on is an excellent way for you to ping any page on-the-fly. If you are on a page and want to Ping it, just click on the Pingler icon in your Chrome browser and the URL of the page will be sent to Pingler and pinged automatically for you.
